message: Let's split it evenly to start, see if we can do better later.
You were too generous last round, now it's my turn to make a more reasonable offer
You think I was too generous last round? I'm not impressed with your offer this time either.
You wanted to take more, now it's my turn to take the lead.
You're getting closer to my target, but I still want a bit more
You think I'm getting closer to your target? I'm not even close to being generous yet.
I'm not backing down, I'm taking a bit more this time.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm not giving up yet
You're not getting any more generous, I'm not getting any less greedy. Let's keep going.
I'm not backing down, I'm taking the lead now.
I'm taking control now, you've had your chance
You think you're taking control? I'm not done yet. I'll make one last offer.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
